pages.text: The scroll contains some instruction on granting, or calling forth, intelligence to the long diseased, allowing you to create and command undead Necromancers from Skeletons.

The Necromancers can be taught to summon more than just Zombies. Right-clicking with certain Necromancy Focuses allows them to summon more types of servants. It's rumored that feeding them with a jar of souls will increase their power...
